title: [Avalanche]
creator_credit: John Danischewsky, Monja Danischewsky and Children's Film Foundation
brief_description: Children’s adventure film set in the Tyrolean Alps. A group of young English children on a skiing holiday in the Alps find themselves in difficulty when one of them has a skiing accident and breaks his leg. Cast includes Howard Marion-Crawford, Moustache, Tarek Sharif and Totti Truman Taylor.
